functional_jobs.job_statement: When I am renovating or landscaping my home, I want to ensure the project runs smoothly and on schedule, so I can enjoy my new space without stress.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Hiring a reliable contractor and managing the supply of materials.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Delays caused by missing materials or miscommunication with contractors.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A seamless project completion with no delays, resulting in a beautiful and functional outdoor space.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: The project is completed on time, within budget, and meets my aesthetic and functional expectations.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When engaging in community activities, I want to feel a sense of belonging and connection, so I can enjoy my new environment and make friends.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Participating in community events and clubs.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: Feeling overwhelmed or lost in social situations due to being new in town.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A welcoming environment that fosters friendships and a sense of community.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: I have made meaningful connections and feel integrated into the community.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I participate in community events, I want to be perceived as an active and engaged member, so I can build my social reputation.
social_jobs.pain_points: Not being recognized or feeling invisible at events.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: To be seen as a contributing member of the community, respected for my involvement.
social_jobs.success_criteria: I receive positive feedback from peers and feel acknowledged for my contributions.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I am new to an area, I want to access information about local services and events, so I can navigate my new environment easily.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Using websites and community resources to gather information.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Difficulty finding reliable information about services and events, leading to confusion.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: A comprehensive guide that provides easy access to essential information about the community.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: I can easily find and utilize local services, enhancing my settling-in experience.
